name: Tap Star: Stress Buster
description:
Tap on the more than 2 stars connected of the same color to bust them ! More than 500 levels certainly bring you infinite joy !
The super hit game Tap Tap Star is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Features:
● Tasty graphics that will leave you hungry for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● Over 500 sweet levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Brushes to help with those challenging levels
